Our Progress

The team is collaborating on a schedule to complete the major project tasks as outlined by our schedule. The Senior Projects class will finish in May of 2014.
The class workshop is scheduled for May 2nd, 2014.

Schedule

Reports

The report graphs are able to graphically represent cell data. The layout of the overall tab is currently under construction. Finally, the interface for the streaming simulation data must be completed and integrated into the tab.

Repository

The repository page's layout is under construction as the team decides on a way to display the data of different model types. The page will incorporate a login system with scope, model type options, and search options.
